docTitle.titlePart:
Exotic ideas on mixed proton-neutron symmetry and
their manifestation in heavy nuclei

byline.docAuthor:
N Pietralla 1 , C Bauer 1 , J Leske 1,3 , O Möller 1 , T Möller 1 , P
von Neumann-Cosel 1 , G Rainovski 2 , A Scheikh-Obeid 1 and C Walz 1

byline.affiliation: 1 Institut für Kernphysik, Technische Universität Darmstadt,
2 Faculty of Physics, St. Kliment Ohridski University of Sofia,

front.div:
Abstract. The one-quadrupole phonon excitation of mixed symmetry, the 2
+
1,ms state, is a
fundamental building block of nuclear structure. This article gives a summary of our recent
experimental research on this excitation mode in the A = 90 and A = 130 mass regions.
